attributes.action: Plight of traumatised soldiers 'ignored by Government'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those charged with caring for military personnel returning from tours of duty have warned of a dramatic increase in servicemen and women needing help because of the traumatic nature of their experiences in Iraq and Afghanistan. 
Our government should be giving our soldiers a better duty of care and help with p.t.s.d. which they are not recieving

rejection.details: Please redraft the main sentence as a call for action from HM Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
